text: Juan Pablo Ramírez Velásquez (26 November 1997) is a footballer from Colombia who plays as a midfielder for Atlético Nacional. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:Categoría Primera B players Category:Leones F.C. footballers Category:Atlético Nacional footballers Category:Deportivo Pasto footballers Category:Colombia under-20 international footballers Category:Colombia youth international footballers
title: Juan Pablo Ramírez
